title: NewYork
body:
<<set $NY = true>>
The Apple.

Grand. Mysterious. Busy. So very busy.

Grand Central's got it's fair share of cool cats. But the clubs are where it's really happening.

Where do you want to go?


[[Blue Note|NewYork2]]

[[Birdland|NewYork2]]

[[Smalls Jazz Club|NewYork2]]

title: NewYork2
body:
So this is what your pops meant by Swing.

Energetic. Orderly. Danceable. Very very danceable. 

Hot like New Orleans, but not as brassy. Saxophones - you don't see those everyday

A Dapper Gentleman approaches you.

Dapper Gentleman: Here to take a bite out of the Big Apple?

[[Jazz: I guess|NewYork3]]

title: NewYork3
body:
Dapper Gentleman: Bet you're thinking this is the cat's meow, ain't ya, doll?

[[Jazz: And how!|LikeSwing]]

[[Jazz: Not really|DislikeSwing]]

title: LikeSwing
body:
Dapper Stranger: You have fine taste there, pal. You much of a swing dancer?

[[Jazz: Ab-so-lute-ly|StaySwing]]

[[Jazz: Not really|SwingFail]]

title: DislikeSwing
body:
???: Finally, a cat that's not afraid to say what's what in this joint.

An energetic individual interjected.

Dapper Gentleman: Beat it, rag-a-muffin. You wouldn't know good music if it bit ya in the bum.

Spike: Go chase yourself, ya sap. 

Spike:You're gonna find out staying in that box isn't as ritzy as you think. 

Spike:And, when you do, I am gonna be waiting right here for ya!

Dapper Gentleman: Keep dreaming, pal.

Spike: So what'll it be, cool cat?

The energetic individual addressed you

Spike: You wanna quit this joint and come listen to something out of this world?

[[Jazz: Lead the way, daddy-O|BebopBar]]

[[Jazz: Lead the way|BebopFail]]

title: BebopBar
body:
Complex harmonies. Complex chord progressions. Improvisatory and spontaneous.

Spike: You like it, cool cat? This is Bebop!!

[[Jazz: I love it!|BebopWin]]

[[Jazz: I can't dance to this|BebopAlmostLoss]]

title: StaySwing
body:
You let the tunes move you across the dance floor. Your dance partner is obviously impressed.

Dapper Gentleman: Hot dawg! You Slay me, doll. I am totally goofy over you. Too bad the bank's closed.
But here, I got something else for ya.

[[Accept gift|GetSwing]]

[[Jazz: No thanks, mac|SwingFail]]

title: SwingFail
body:
Dapper Gentleman: A shame, really. Well, I have to go see a man about a dog. Be seeing ya.

There doesn't seem to be anything else for you to do here.

[[Go back to train|TrainHub]]

title: BebopFail
body:
Spike: Aw Rhatz! That's a disappointment, if ever there was one. 

Well, you have a good evening there, pal.

The energetic individual walked away.

There was nothing left for you to do here.

[[Go back to the train station|TrainHub]]

title: BebopAlmostLoss
body:
Spike: No rules to keep us in the box. Just a cat, and the Blues. 
Spike: Isn't it great? 

[[Jazz: And how!|BebopWin]]

[[Jazz: I am not really feeling it.|BebopFail]]

title: BebopWin
body:
Spike: I knew you'd love it! Here I got something for you.

You received the Spirit of Bebop.

Spike: Put this to good use, cool cat. I'll be seeing you.

[[Go back to the train|TrainHub]]
<<set $inventory = $inventory+1>>
<<set $bebop = true>>

title: GetSwing
body:
You receive THE SPIRIT OF SWING

Dapper Gentleman: Something tells me you got other places you gotta be, doll. 
Dapper Gentleman: You take care now, you hear?

[[Go back to the train|TrainHub]]
<<set $inventory = $inventory+1>>
<<set $swing = true>>
